Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $29.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 12:11:39 UTC – Details)

Product Description

How to install the Lighted Gift Boxes

1. Insert the mounting rod into the folded gift box to support them to a cube.

2. Put them anywhere you like. If used outdoor, use the stakes to fix them to the ground.

3. Plug in and the lights will turn on.

Warning

1. Please cover the plug with a box if used outside.

2. Please unplug this item when not in use.

3. Children must use under the guidance of adults and be kept away from heat sources to avoid accidents.

Specifications Shell Material: Scallion cloth and iron frame IP Rating: IP44 waterproof Boxes Spacing: 10 in Lead Length: 118 in Bulb QTY: 60 count Input:120V~60Hz,0.12A Output: 4.5V,1A Power: AC/DC

Attractive Design – The lighted gift boxes are designed with Christmas elements like snowflakes pattern, pine cones, pine needles, red berries and classic Christmas colors, red, green and blue. The bows are detachable, you can attach them to different boxes as you like
3 Sizes Light Up Christmas Presents – 10″x10″x10″ large red box with 25 led bulbs, 8″x8″x8″ medium green box with 20 led bulbs, 6″x6″x6″ small blue box with 15 led bulbs. The lights are warm white, creating a cozy Christmas atmosphere
Easy to Install and Disassemble – Just insert support rods into the boxes, and put them anywhere indoors. Use the stakes to fix them to the ground if used outdoor. The pop up Christmas gift boxes decorations are retractable for easy storage
Durable Material – Sturdy metal frame supports the Christmas light up decorations. The Scallion cloth covered on the outside is waterproof and not easy to fade. The bulbs are buckled for a beautiful light effect, match your Christmas tree decorations well
Indoor and Outdoor Use – Christmas lighted gift boxes are IP44 waterproof, are perfect outdoor lighted holiday displays for your walkway, yard, porch, or indoor Christmas decorations for locations like living room. Please cover the plug with a box if used outside

How to install the Lighted Gift Boxes

1. Insert the mounting rod into the folded gift box to support them to a cube.

2. Put them anywhere you like. If used outdoor, use the stakes to fix them to the ground.

3. Plug in and the lights will turn on.

Warning

1. Please cover the plug with a box if used outside.

2. Please unplug this item when not in use.

3. Children must use under the guidance of adults and be kept away from heat sources to avoid accidents.

Specifications

  • Shell Material: Scallion cloth and iron frame
  • IP Rating: IP44 waterproof
  • Boxes Spacing: 10 in
  • Lead Length: 118 in
  • Bulb QTY: 60 count
  • Input:120V~60Hz,0.12A
  • Output: 4.5V,1A
  • Power: AC/DC

Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Please review the warranty carefully, and contact the manufacturer if you have any questions.

Price: $29.95 - $21.48
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:00:46 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Game Story

Let the furious fun begin! Players sprint to arrange a set of 5 blocks so that they match a pattern shown on a card. First player to succeed grabs the card and a new matching race starts. Tensions rise as you scramble to outpace and outsmart your opponents in this ingenious game of perception. So fire-up your neurons and be transported by Match Madness!!

How To Play Match Madness

1. Take a set of five blocks.

2. Flip a pattern card.

3. The first player to recreate the pattern wins!

About Us

FoxMind manufactures and distributes toys and games that offer mind stimulating fun and help develop reasoning skills.

We strive to be known as ‘the Smarter Fun company’ that brings family and friends together for memorable times.

FAST-PACED AND ACTION-PACKED: Players race to solve the puzzle on the card by flipping, rotating and combining identical sets of 5 patterned blocks. Sharp eyes, fast hands and quick minds prevail in this fun-filled pattern-matching frenzy!
PATTERN RECOGNITION AND DEXTERITY: Develop rapid problem-solving abilities and fine motor skills. Match Madness encourages players to think critically, experiment and develop new strategies in order solve the puzzles more quickly.
TWO GAME MODES FOR HIGHER REPLAYABILITY: Choose between Quick-Play (speed) and Total Madness (highest score wins).
AWARD-WINNING FAMILY GAME: Winner of the 2018 Imagination Gaming Family Gold Award and Problem-Solving Gold Award.
SUITABLE FOR AGES 7 AND UP: Can be played in groups of up to 4 players. Match Madness can also be played solo: solve the puzzles at your own pace or try to beat your best times.

Read more

From the brand

FOR YOUR BEST PET FRIENDS

Shop Our Best Sellers

Shop Our Best Sellers

About Luciphia

Pets are our best friends, and we do our best to provide them with the best care and attention.

Luciphia was founded with a clear purpose – for your best pet friends.

Luciphia finds a variety of fabrics and designs them carefully to provide your pet friends with blankets and beds in a variety of styles and functions. Create a warm and cozy home for your pet friends with warm and soft blankets and beds to enjoy your pet time!

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Item model number ‏ : ‎ TZ-IUYL240
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ June 28, 2018
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ luciphia
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07BGWTSX6
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

MATERIAL: 100% double-sided coral velvet textures (polyester).The blankets are made of ultra-soft extravagant fabric.
EASY TO WASH/CLEAN: 100% machine washable. The blankets not only look elegant, it is also easy to clean and dry. It can be utilized as a cover or quilt for dogs, cats and other pets.
USAGE: Protect furniture from scratching and pet hair. Cute and lovely paw print design. No pilling, skin-friendly, perfect for the couch, sofa, bed and pet carrier.
EASY TO CARRY: The blankets are soft and lightweight. It’s perfect to take it to participate in outdoor activities, such as traveling, camping, and picnic. Keep your pets warm and cozy during sleeping in the outdoors.

Soft and Comfortable

  • Top soft flannel with attractive designs.
  • Soft coral fleece never irritates your pet’s skin.

Durable and Exquisite

  • Premium fleece and strong stitching ensure great durability.
  • Available in 3 sizes to fit any pet crate.

Easy Care

  • Machine washable, no shape changing after each washing.
  • Conveniently hand and machine washable for a hassle-free clean.
